Prismatic Grace.description: Prismatic Grace is a piece of craftable Exotic armour in Dauntless. It is crafted from Rezakiri reagents.
Prismatic Grace.name: Prismatic Grace

unique_effects.description: After reviving another player, grant them a Radiant Prism that blocks incoming damage for {{prismTime}} seconds.
unique_effects.name: PrismaticGraceRevivePrism

unique_effects.description: The first time you take lethal damage, gain a Radiant Prism that blocks incoming damage for {{prismTime}} seconds.
unique_effects.name: PrismaticGraceLethalDamagePrism

unique_effects.description: While active, reviving another player fully restores both players but removes the Prism even at full danger.
unique_effects.name: PrismaticGraceActivePrismRevive

The Skullforge.description: The Skullforge is a piece of craftable Exotic armour in Dauntless. It is crafted from Firebrand Charrogg reagents.
The Skullforge.name: The Skullforge

unique_effects.description: {{damage}}% of all damage dealt becomes a stamina shield (max {{staminaShieldMax}}) that depletes first when spending stamina. Depletes slowly after {{staminaShieldTime}} seconds not dealing damage.
unique_effects.name: DamageStaminaShield

Timeweave Gauntlets.description: {{typeAlt}} protection, part of the Timeweave set.
Timeweave Gauntlets.name: Timeweave Gauntlets

Timeweave Helm.description: {{typeAlt}} protection, part of the Timeweave set.
Timeweave Helm.name: Timeweave Helm

Timeweave Leggings.description: {{typeAlt}} protection, part of the Timeweave set.
Timeweave Leggings.name: Timeweave Leggings

Timeweave Robes.description: {{typeAlt}} protection, part of the Timeweave set.
Timeweave Robes.name: Timeweave Robes

Tragic Echo.description: Tragic Echo is a piece of craftable Exotic armour in Dauntless. It is crafted from Shrowd reagents.
Tragic Echo.name: Tragic Echo

unique_effects.description: Upon your first death, become a shadow clone that deals {{damage}}% increased damage for {{damageTime}} seconds.
unique_effects.name: TragicEchoDamageIncrease

lantern_ability.hold: Drop a bomb from above that explodes after {{bombTime}} second.  Deals {{damage}} damage and can interrupt Behemoths.
lantern_ability.holdT: 放置一枚炸彈在 {{bombTime}} 秒後爆炸。造成 {{damage}} 點傷害並且具備打斷效果。

lantern_ability.hold: Fires a lightning bolt in a direction that deals {{shockDamage}} Shock damage multiple times as it passes through enemies.
lantern_ability.holdT: 射出一道直線閃電，對其穿過的巨獸部位各造成 {{shockDamage}} 點雷電傷害。

lantern_ability.hold: Create a fire ball in front of you that explodes after {{fireBallTime}} seconds, dealing {{blazeDamage}} Blaze damage to all nearby enemies.
lantern_ability.holdT: 在前方生成一個火焰球， {{fireBallTime}} 秒後爆炸造成總計 {{blazeDamage}} 點火焰屬性的AOE傷害（最多命中3個不同的部位）。

lantern_ability.hold: Dash in a direction, deal {{terraDamage}} Terra damage to nearby enemies upon arrival, and gain {{percentLifesteal}}% lifesteal for {{lifestealTime}} seconds.
lantern_ability.holdT: 衝刺一段距離，對位移終點附近最多3個巨獸部位造成總計 {{terraDamage}} 點自然傷害。 並獲得 {{percentLifesteal}}% 的生命偸取，持續 {{lifestealTime}} 秒。

lantern_ability.hold: Create a frost pillar in front of you that deals {{frostDamage}} Frost damage to nearby enemies over {{damageTime}} seconds.
lantern_ability.holdT: 在前方製造一道冰棱，在 {{damageTime}} 秒内對范圍内最多5個巨獸部位造成總計 {{frostDamage}} 點霜凍傷害。

lantern_ability.hold: Grants a {{shield}} hit point shield that lasts {{shieldTime}} seconds.
lantern_ability.holdT: 獲得 {{shield}} 点生命値護盾，持續 {{shieldTime}} 秒。

lantern_ability.hold: Creates an aura that grants nearby Slayers {{percentIncreasedMovementAndAttackSpeed}}% increased move speed and attack speed for {{attackSpeedTime}} seconds.
lantern_ability.holdT: 製造一個光環，使自身和周圍的隊友移動速度和攻擊速度提高 {{percentIncreasedMovementAndAttackSpeed}}% ，持續 {{attackSpeedTime}} 秒。

lantern_ability.hold: Surrounds the slayer in swirling stone that deals {{terraDamage}} Terra damage to nearby enemies for {{damageTime}} seconds. Also generates {{shield}} hit point shields per second that expire after {{shieldTime}} seconds. (Max {{maxShield}} shields)
lantern_ability.holdT: 製造一圈包裹自身的岩石旋風，在{{damageTime}}秒内對范圍内最多3個巨獸部位造成總計 {{terraDamage}} 點自然傷害， 持續{{damageTime}}秒。毎秒生成 {{shield}} 點生命値護盾，  並在 {{shieldTime}} 秒後失效。（最多 {{maxShield}} 點護盾）

Artificer.active: Command: Your drone acts based on the target.{{NL}} 1. Slayer: Remove negative status effects and grant Artificer Aura for {{statusRemovalTime}}s.{{NL}} 2. Ground: Create a wall that blocks hostile projectiles and grants Artificer Aura to nearby Slayers for {{wallTime}}s.{{NL}} 3. Behemoth: Make a part to take +{{percentDamage}}% damage for {{damageTime}}s.{{NL}} 4. Downed Slayer: Revive and grant Artificer Aura for {{reviveAuraTime}}s (once every {{reviveCooldown}}s).{{NL}} Artificer Aura: Restore {{auraHeal}} health/second. At full health, grants {{auraShield}} Shields/second that last for {{shieldTime}}s (maximum {{maxShields}} Shields){{NL}} Cooldown: {{cooldown}}s
Artificer.name: Artificer
Artificer.passive: Amount of healing and shielding granted per second is increased by {{healingAndShielding}} for every {{currentHealth}} current health when activated.

Bastion.active: Leap forward and slam the ground consuming all shields in a blast of energy that deals damage to nearby targets equal to {{percentShieldDamage}}% the amount of shields consumed. {{damageCooldown}} second cooldown.
Bastion.name: Bastion
Bastion.passive: Increase all shields received by {{percentShieldIncrease}}%. Dealing damage has a chance to grant a stacking, refreshing {{shield}} health shield that lasts for {{shieldTime}} seconds (max {{maxShields}} shields).

Discipline.active: Perform a quick parrying punch that deals {{blazeDamage}} blaze damage. Parrying an attack does +{{percentParryDamage}}% damage and grants a stack of Flaming Fist,  giving +{{percentCritDamage}}% critical strike damage. This can stack {{stacks}} times.  {{cooldown}} second cooldown.
Discipline.name: Discipline
Discipline.passive: Critical strike chance and damage increased by {{percentCritChanceAndCritDamage}}%. Healing is reduced by {{percentHealingReduction}}%. Reaching max stacks of Flaming Fist makes you Disciplined, increasing your critical strike chance by {{percentCritChance}}% for {{critChanceTime}} seconds  but increased damage received by {{percentDamageReceived}}%. When Disciplined ends, stacks are cleared.

Iceborne.active: Throw an ice lance that does {{frostDamage}} frost damage, double damage if thrown at full health. Also prevents you from being staggered and grants +{{percentLifesteal}}% lifesteal  for {{lifestealTime}} seconds. {{cooldown}} second cooldown.
Iceborne.name: Iceborne
Iceborne.passive: Increase max health by {{maxHealth}}. Gain {{percentLifesteal}}% lifesteal and {{percentDamageReduction}}% reduced damage, then again for every {{missingHealth}} missing health. Taking damage reduces cooldown of the Active Ability by {{cooldownReduction}} seconds (only once every {{cooldown}} seconds).

Revenant.active: Drain up to {{healthDrain}} health to enter Revenant state and spawn a Void Orb. For every {{drainedHealth}} health drained, summon an Umbral Tendril that deals {{umbralDamage}} umbral damage. If an Umbral Tendril hits a target, it spawns an additional Void Orb upon impact. Picking up a Void Orb grants a stack of Void Energy,  which gives +{{percentDamage}}% damage and extends Revenant state by {{revenantDurationExtend}}  second. Revenant state lasts for {{revenantTime}} seconds and prevents all healing.
Revenant.name: Revenant
Revenant.passive: Lifesteal +{{percentLifesteal}}%. When Revenant state ends, each stack of Void Energy grants {{health}} health per second for {{healthTime}} seconds.

Tempest.active: Consume a stack of Velocity to dash ahead and deal {{shockDamage}} shock damage to a nearby target, prioritizing unbroken behemoth parts. For every {{percentMovementIncreaseThreshold}}% increase in movement speed, deal +{{percentDamageToUnbrokenPart}}% damage to unbroken parts. Stacks are refreshed on use. {{cooldown}} second cooldown.
Tempest.name: Tempest
Tempest.passive: Attack speed +{{percentAttackSpeed}}%. Dodging through an attack grants a stack of Velocity. Each stack lasts {{stackTime}} seconds and increases movement speed by {{percentMovespeed}}%

Cyclonic Strikeplate.name: Cyclonic Strikeplate
part_effect: Tempest Form duration increased by {{timeIncreased}} seconds. When Tempest Form has less than {{timeLess}} seconds remaining, deal +{{damage}}% damage.
part_effectT: 迅風疾影歩buff持續時間增加10秒（原本30秒），當buff持續時間剩餘10秒時獲得+15%破壞傷害直到buff結束。

Echo Bracedriver.name: Echo Bracedriver
part_effect: Critical strikes increase the damage dealt by Karma Breaker's damage over time by {{damage}}% until the debuff ends or is refreshed.
part_effectT: 金剛通背拳dot效果持續時間内毎次暴擊都會使當持續傷害的剩餘總傷害量增加10%，直到debuff結束或刷新

Inertial Fistguard.name: Inertial Fistguard
part_effect: Surge deals +{{damage}}% damage. After surging, gain +{{speed}}% movespeed for {{speedTime}} seconds. Stacks up to {{speedStack}} times.
part_effectT: 浪嘯潮涌的傷害增加25%。並且毎次使用浪嘯潮涌後移動速度提高5%持續8秒，可疊加，最多3次。

Adamant Bolt.name: Adamant Bolt
part_effect: Unleash energy in a focused blast, dealing {{damageBlast}} damage to the first enemy hit. Deals up to +{{damage}}% damage when Tempest Form and Karma Breaker's effects are active.
part_effectT: 消耗3個真言，躍起向前方發射光炮，對第一個命中的巨獸部位造成900點傷害。當迅風疾影歩和金剛通背拳buff同時存在時傷害翻倍。

Titan's Crash.name: Titan's Crash
part_effect: Unleash energy forward in a pressure wave, dealing {{damageWave}} damage to the closest target and {{damageNearbyTarget}} damage to nearby target. Deals up to +{{damage}}% damage when Tempest Form and Karma Breaker's effects are active.
part_effectT: 集中釋放能量造成爆炸，破壞第一個命中的敵人。當迅風疾影歩和金剛通背拳的BUFF激活奘態下，造成額外傷害。

Furious Axecore.name: Furious Axecore
part_effect: Perfectly charged attacks grants +{{meter}} meter on hit, but no longer grant resolve.
part_effectT: 完美的三蓄攻擊命中時額外獲得15點武器能量，但是攻擊動作不再具備剛體效果。

Lightweight Haft.name: Lightweight Haft
part_effect: Movespeed while charging Horizontal Attacks is now increased instead of decreased and costs no stamina to maintain.
part_effectT: 蓄力橫斬移動時，移動速度降低的負面效果現在變爲移動速度提高，同時橫斬蓄力時的體力消耗減少50%。

Overcharged Cylinder.name: Overcharged Cylinder
part_effect: Determination can now stack up to {{times}} times.
part_effectT: 陷陣之志的疊加上限從3層變為4層。

Railsplitter's Canteen.name: Railsplitter's Canteen
part_effect: Tonics consumed while your axe is thrown have +{{effect}}% effectiveness.
part_effectT: 斧頭投擲出去後處于空手奘態時所有藥水的效果加強50%。

Volatile Axecore.name: Volatile Axecore
part_effect: Charging attack deals aoe damage to nearby enemies at each charge level.
part_effectT: 蓄力攻擊會基于蓄力等級造成範圍傷害。

Flight of Ruin.name: Flight of Ruin
part_effect: Throw the axe forward, damaging enemies while thrown. Reactivate to call the axe and perform a powerful overhand swing that can generate determination.
part_effectT: 向前投擲獵斧，在投擲過程中對敵人造成傷害。重新使用召回獵斧並進行一次強力縱斬，縱斬命中可以産生陷陣之志效果。

Grim Onslaught.name: Grim Onslaught
part_effect: Throw the axe forward, damaging enemies in its path before landing a distance away. Hitting a Behemoth can generate Resolve and will bounce the axe back towards the user.
part_effectT: 向前投擲獵斧，在投擲過程中對敵人造成傷害。重新使用召回獵斧並進行一次強力縱斬，縱斬命中可以産生陷陣之志效果。

Relentless Onslaught.name: Relentless Onslaught
part_effect: Hurl the axe forward, damaging enemies in its path. Catch the axe to throw it again up to {{axeThrow}} more times in the next {{axeThrowTime}} seconds, dealing {{axeDamage1}}/{{axeDamage2}}/{{axeDamage3}} damage (further increased by determination). Does not build meter.
part_effectT: 向前投擲獵斧，飛行路徑上接觸到的第一個巨獸部位造成傷害並且將斧子彈回獵人。投擲命中可以獲得短時間的剛體效果，並將斧子彈回獵人所在的方向。

Demolition Blades.name: Demolition Blades
part_effect: Deal +{{damage}}% damage to minions, fauna and objects created by Behemoths. On killing a minion, fauna, or object, gain {{momentum}} momentum.
part_effectT: 對巨獸製造或召喚的物體造成的傷害提高50%。毎擊殺一個對巨獸製造或召喚的物體時獲得一顆星。

Hurricane Blades.name: Hurricane Blades
part_effect: Using Blade Spin grants stacking on-next hit damage that is consumed when using other attacks.
part_effectT: 迴旋亂舞毎次命中都會疊加一個作用于下一次攻擊的增傷效果。

Lightweight Chain.name: Lightweight Chain
part_effect: Increase the length of your chains by +{{lengthBonus}}%. Your Chain Pull deals +{{damage}}% damage and generates an additional {{meter}} meter.
part_effectT: 將你的鎖鐮長度增加+25%。並使鎖鐮造成傷害+25%並額外延長20米。

Momentum Blades.name: Momentum Blades
part_effect: After using a special, your next special use within {{time}} seconds is free.
part_effectT: 使用一次武器特殊技能(Q)之後，4秒内可以無消耗再使用一次。

Serrated Blades.name: Serrated Blades
part_effect: Bladed attacks have a chance to cause your next {{attacks}} lacerating attacks to deal +{{damage}}% wound damage.
part_effectT: 斬擊有概率使你的下4次撕裂攻擊造成+50%的創裂傷害。

Cruel Riftstrike.name: Cruel Riftstrike
part_effect: Teleport forward with invulnerability and strike the nearest Behemoth part, dealing {{damage}} damage and applying a mark that deals {{damageMark}} damage per second for {{damageMarkTime}} seconds. When a mark expires, it deals {{damageMarkExpires}} damage for each other mark active at the time. Mark duration increased to {{timeMarkIncreased}} seconds if an attack is avoided during the teleport.
part_effectT: 以無敵奘態傳送並攻擊最近的巨獸部位，造成75點傷害，並施加一個毎秒造成25點傷害的標記，持續7秒。當一個標記失效時，對同一時間生效的其他標記造成200點傷害。如果在傳送過程中完美閃避一次攻擊，標記的持續時間將增加到10秒。

Insatiable Dance.name: Insatiable Dance
part_effect: Push off a nearby target with invulnerability, then use primary or secondary attacks to perform a followup. Primary: A dash attack to the target that consumes {{momentum}} momentum. Secondary: A spinning slam that consumes all momentum to heal you and create a {{heal}} healing orb for each momentum consumed. Targets at or healed to full health gain {{damage}}% damage for {{damageTime}} seconds, stacking up to {{damageStack}} times. (Consume {{momentumIfNoFollow}} momentum if no follow up is performed.)
part_effectT: 主要攻擊：對目標進行沖刺攻擊，消耗1點星型。次要攻擊：旋轉猛擊，消耗所有星型來回復治療，並且毎消耗一個星型就産生一個150點生命的治療球。處于或被治愈至完全生命値的目標獲得+5%傷害，持續10秒，最多可疊加4次。

Reaper's Dance.name: Reaper's Dance
part_effect: Push off a nearby target with invulnerability, then use primary or secondary attacks to perform a follow up. Primary: A dash attack to the target that consumes {{momentum}} momentum. Secondary: A spinning slam that consumes all momentum and deals greatly increased damage per momentum consumed. (Consume {{momentumIfNoFollow}} momentum if no follow up is performed)
part_effectT: 主要攻擊：對目標進行沖刺攻擊，消耗1點星型。次要攻擊：旋轉猛擊，消耗所有星型來回復治療，並且毎消耗一個星型就産生一個150點生命的治療球。處于或被治愈至完全生命値的目標獲得+5%傷害，持續10秒，最多可疊加4次。

Antique Clip.name: Antique Clip
part_effect: Ammo decreased to {{ammoDecrease}}, but bonus from aethercharged ammo is increased by {{percentDamage}}%.
part_effectT: 彈夾從4發減少到2發，但是充能彈藥提供的加成變成3倍。

Extended Clip.name: Extended Clip
part_effect: Ammo increased to {{ammoIncrease}}.
part_effectT: 彈夾從4發增加到6發。

Impulse Crown.name: Impulse Crown
part_effect: Aerial Strike grants increased damage dealt for {{damageTime}} seconds. Bonus is doubled if a Behemoth's head is struck.
part_effectT: 火箭跳錘會提供一個10秒的攻強buff。如果凌空打擊命中巨獸頭部則增傷效果翻倍。

Turbine Trigger.name: Turbine Trigger
part_effect: Priming attacks increases attack speed by {{percentAttackSpeed}}% until the combo ends. Stacks.
part_effectT: 左鍵攻擊命中時提高10%攻擊速度直到連招結束，可多次疊加。(上限10層)

Weighted Crown.name: Weighted Crown
part_effect: Stagger damage is no longer halved when attacking Behemoth legs.
part_effectT: 攻擊巨獸腿時，失衡傷害不再減半。

Concussive Salvo.name: Concussive Salvo
part_effect: Loads ammo into the hammer before releasing, damage and interrupting behemoths.
part_effectT: 當錘子裝滿彈藥並發射時，它會損壞並干擾巨獸。

Ironheart Landbreaker.name: Ironheart Landbreaker
part_effect: Hold to load ammo into the hammer. Release to create an aether vent that buffs players who step over it, granting them +{{percentDamageReduction}}% damage reduction and up to {{healing}} healing over {{healingTime}} seconds when aethercharged.
part_effectT: 將彈藥裝填到炮錘中，右鍵原地消耗彈藥製造一個需要拾取的攻強buff。普通彈藥20%攻強，強化彈藥35%攻強。

Mighty Landbreaker.name: Mighty Landbreaker
part_effect: Loads ammo into the hammer before releasing, creating an aether vent that buffs players.
part_effectT: 當錘子裝滿彈藥並發射時，它會損壞並干擾巨獸。

Full-Bore Chamber.description: The Full-Bore Chamber is part of a craftable weapon in Dauntless.
Full-Bore Chamber.name: Full-Bore Chamber
part_effect: Fires a piercing bolt in a line, dealing damage that falls as it travels.
Empowered: Deals greatly increased damage and pushes the slayer backwards.
part_effectT: 它射出一條直線穿透的電擊。傷害隨著距離的增加而減少。

Marksman Chamber.description: The Marksman Chamber is part of a craftable weapon in Dauntless.
Marksman Chamber.name: Marksman Chamber
part_effect: Fires a shot in a line, dealing {{damage}} damage to the first Behemoth hit. If a part is struck, that part takes {{percentDamage}}% more damage from Shots for {{damageTime}} seconds.
Empowered: Damage bonus increased to {{empoweredPercentDamage}}%, and {{empoweredPercentAllyDamage}}% to all allies.
part_effectT: 發射一槍，對巨獸 區域造成傷害並標記增加對標記區域的傷害

Salvo Chamber.description: The Salvo Chamber is part of a craftable weapon in Dauntless.
Salvo Chamber.name: Salvo Chamber
part_effect: Fires an explosive missile in a line, dealing {{damage}} damage in an area upon impact.
Empowered: Fires {{missiles}} missiles in a spread.
part_effectT: 發射一枚爆炸導彈，對命中的第一個目標造成傷害。

Captain's Grip.description: The Captain's Grip is part of a craftable weapon in Dauntless.
Captain's Grip.name: Captain's Grip
part_effect: Launches a collectible buff a short distance, granting {{percentAttackSpeed}}% increased attack speed for {{attackSpeedTime}} seconds when collected.
Empowered: Grants the same buff to all Slayers.
part_effectT:
向近距離發射一個增幅器，觸碰增幅器的獵人獲得15%的攻速提升持續15秒。
強化奘態：攻速提升同時作用于全體隊友。

Saboteur's Grip.description: The Saboteur's Grip is part of a craftable weapon in Dauntless.
Saboteur's Grip.name: Saboteur's Grip
part_effect: Launches an explosive mine that deals {{damage}} damage. Mine charges after a short period, increasing damage to {{increasedDamage}}.
Empowered: Deals {{empoweredDamage}} damage when charged and can interrupt Behemoths.
part_effectT:
發射一顆爆炸地雷，對觸發地雷的巨獸造成400點傷害。一段時間後若地雷未被觸發則會自動充能，造成的傷害提高到700點。
強化奘態：自動充能後造成的傷害提高到900點，並且具備打斷效果。

Capacitive Magazine.name: Capacitive Magazine
part_effect: Using an ability returns {{ammo}} standard ammo to the magazine.
part_effectT: 使用任意武器技能都將爲彈夾補充8發彈藥。

Demolition Sights.name: Demolition Sights
part_effect: While empowered, deal +{{percentObjectDamage}}% damage to objects created by Behemoths.
part_effectT: 對巨獸製造或召喚的物體造成的傷害提高50%。強化裝填奘態下，提高至100%。

Extraction Catalyst.name: Extraction Catalyst
part_effect: Reduce both ability cooldowns by {{cooldownReduction}} seconds when dodging through Behemoth attacks.
part_effectT: 完美閃避後減少所有技能2秒冷卻時間。

Lightweight Frame.name: Lightweight Frame
part_effect: Gain {{percentMovespeed}}% increased movespeed when at {{currentAmmo}} or less ammo.
part_effectT: 當彈夾内剩餘6發或以下子彈時，獲得20%移動速度加成。

Lucky Magazine.name: Lucky Magazine
part_effect: Grants {{percentCritChance}}% critical strike chance for each round missing from the magazine.
part_effectT: 彈夾中毎少1發子彈就使獵人獲得2%暴擊率加成，更換彈夾則重新計算。

Precision Sights.name: Precision Sights
part_effect: Deal {{damage}} increased damage when attacking the same part multiple times. Stacks up to {{stacks}} times.
part_effectT: 多次攻擊同一部位會增加造成的傷害。

Scoped Sights.name: Scoped Sights
part_effect: Increases damage falloff range by {{damageFalloff}}%
part_effectT: 有效射程提高25%。

Tactician's Magazine.name: Tactician's Magazine
part_effect: Empowered Reloading at exactly {{currentAmmo}} ammo decreases the cooldown of both abilities by {{cooldownReduction}} seconds.
part_effectT: 彈夾爲0時強化裝填成功會減少所有技能冷卻時間4秒。

Charged Swordfocus.name: Charged Swordfocus
part_effect: Instead of dealing damage over time, Resounding Echo deals damage once after it expires and deals +{{percentDamage}}% total damage.
part_effectT: 刀劍嘯（Resounding Echo）不再造成持續性傷害，而改為在短暫延遲後一次性爆發所有傷害，並且傷害總量提高35%。

Dynamic Bladecore.name: Dynamic Bladecore
part_effect: After using any Valour combo, your next Valour combo within {{damageTime}} seconds deals +{{percentDamage}}% damage.
part_effectT: 在使用了任何消耗勇氣的勇氣劍技後，5秒内的下一次勇氣劍技造成的傷害提高30%。

Keen Edge.name: Keen Edge
part_effect: After dealing damage with the Bladesurge projectile, increase your movement speed by {{percentMovespeed}}% for {{movespeedTime}} seconds. Additionally, after the Bladesurge projectile travels a short distance, the damage is increased by {{percentDamage}}%.
part_effectT: 造成傷害後，獲得 [MAGNITUDE_PERCENT] 的傷害加成，持續時間 3 秒。可疊加 10 次。

Mending Bladecore.name: Mending Bladecore
part_effect: Each Valour gained or spent restores {{health}} health
part_effectT: 毎個獲得或使用的勇氣槽會回復30點血量。

Recursive Hilt.name: Recursive Hilt
part_effect: Dealing damage with Bladerush restores {{stamina}} stamina and generates {{valour}} Valour over {{valourTime}} seconds. Does not stack.
part_effectT: 刃衝造成傷害時立即為玩家恢復20點體力値，並在之後的9秒内産生3格勇氣（無法疊加）。

Ardent Cyclone.name: Ardent Cyclone
part_effect: Activate at full meter to spin, dealing {{damage}} damage constantly to nearby enemies. Grants {{valour}} Valour every {{valourTime}} seconds. Reactivate to slash in a direction, dealing {{reactivateDamage}} + ({{hitBonusDamage}} x number of spin hits) to the first enemy hit.
part_effectT: 能量全滿時進入解放奘態，增加攻速（20%）且所有攻擊附帶範圍傷害的劍氣（60-80）。可再次按Q進行短暫招架，招架時受到攻擊會立即自動反擊造成800點傷害並且免疫該次攻擊的傷害及硬直，同時産生1點勇氣。 （2秒冷卻時間）

Avenging Overdrive.name: Avenging Overdrive
part_effect: Activate at full meter to enter Overdrive, gaining +{{percentAttackSpeed}}% attacks speed and causing attacks to deal +{{aoeDamageMin}}-{{aoeDamageMax}} aoe damage. Reactivate to parry and riposte a Behemoth attack, dealing {{damage}} damage and granting {{valour}} Valour when successful ({{valourCooldown}} second cooldown)
part_effectT: 能量全滿時進入解放奘態，增加攻速（20%）且所有攻擊附帶範圍傷害的劍氣（60-80）。可再次按Q進行短暫招架，招架時受到攻擊會立即自動反擊造成800點傷害並且免疫該次攻擊的傷害及硬直，同時産生1點勇氣。 （2秒冷卻時間）

Valiant Overdrive.name: Valiant Overdrive
part_effect: Activate at full meter to enter Overdrive, gaining +{{percentAttackSpeed}}% attack speed and causing attacks to deal +{{aoeDamageMin}}-{{aoeDamageMax}} aoe damage. Grants {{valour}} Valour immediately and then {{valourRegen}} Valour every {{valourTime}} seconds. Reactivate to dash in a direction (Costs {{valourCost}} Valour).
part_effectT: 能量全滿時進入解放奘態，增加攻速（20%）且所有攻擊附帶範圍傷害的劍氣（60-80）。可再次按Q進行短暫招架，招架時受到攻擊會立即自動反擊造成800點傷害並且免疫該次攻擊的傷害及硬直，同時産生1點勇氣。 （2秒冷卻時間）

Balanced Spearhead.name: Balanced Spearhead
part_effect: Increases damage dealt by {{damageIncreasePierceAndHarvest}}% each time Piercing and Harvesting attacks are alternated. After the fifth alternating attack, increase damage dealt by {{damageIncreaseAfterFifthAttack}}% for {{duration}} seconds. Resets upon combo end.
part_effectT: 對于毎個有效的擴展，您都會獲得增加傷害和減少傷害的效果。

Barbed Spearhead.name: Barbed Spearhead
part_effect: After a dodge piercing attack, gain +{{percentWoundDamage}}% wound damage for {{woundDamageTime}} seconds.
part_effectT: 閃避突刺（閃避後左鍵）命中後在 8 秒内獲得創裂傷害 +50%

Executioner's Spearhead.name: Executioner's Spearhead
part_effect: Each time you wound or assist wounding a Behemoth, gain {{percentDamage}}% damage for {{damageTime}} seconds. Stacks up to {{stacks}}.
part_effectT: 毎當巨獸部位創裂或協助創裂時，本場狩獵中你造成的所有傷害提高8%，持續45秒。最多疊加5次。

Lightweight Shaft.name: Lightweight Shaft
part_effect: Pike charge attack no longer costs stamina and always critically strikes.
part_effectT: 戰矛衝鋒刺擊不再需要消耗體力，且一定會暴擊。

Munitions Amplifier.name: Munitions Amplifier
part_effect: Stored ammo quality increases slowly over time, up to max. Stored ammo quality is also increased by an additional {{ammoQuality}}%.
part_effectT: 已轉化的彈藥質量會隨時間緩慢提升直到最大。存儲的彈藥質量也提高了25%。

Concussive Payload.name: Concussive Payload
part_effect: Press to convert meter into ammo. Hold to spend ammo to fire a missile that deals up to {{damage}} damage based on ammo quality and can interrupt Behemoths.
part_effectT: 將武器能量轉化為彈藥，長按消耗一枚彈藥製造暴擊光環，為光環内的所有友軍提供10%暴擊率加成，持續時間10秒。 （基于彈藥質量提高+30％爆擊機率）

Reckless Leap.name: Reckless Leap
part_effect: Press to convert meter into ammo. Hold to spend ammo and perform a flying lunge attack that deals up to {{damage}} damage based on distance and ammo quality.
part_effectT: 將武器能量轉化為彈藥，長按消耗一枚彈藥製造暴擊光環，為光環内的所有友軍提供10%暴擊率加成，持續時間10秒。 （基于彈藥質量提高+30％爆擊機率）

Savage Wellspring.name: Savage Wellspring
part_effect: Press to convert meter into ammo. Hold to spend ammo to create an aura that buffs nearby allies with up to +{{percentCritChance}}% critical strike chance based on ammo quality for {{critChanceTime}} seconds.
part_effectT: 將武器能量轉化為彈藥，長按消耗一枚彈藥製造暴擊光環，為光環内的所有友軍提供10%暴擊率加成，持續時間10秒。 （基于彈藥質量提高+30％爆擊機率）

unique_effects.descriptionT: 傳奇能力：[Legendary Attack]復活大範圍内的所有獵人，給予他們一段時間的治療和免疫失衡。可用于倒地死亡時使用。毎局狩獵中只能使用一次，但是擊殺巨獸可以刷新使用次數或5分鐘後重置。

unique_effects.name: ThraxLegendaryAbility

unique_effects.description:
Legendary Ability: Enter a rage, gaining new attacks for {{rageTime}} seconds. Deals +{{damage}}% damage when the target is below
{{healthBelow}}% health. Usable once, but resets on Behemoth kill.
unique_effects.descriptionT: 傳奇能力：[Legendary Attack]進入暴怒奘態，獲得新的攻擊方式，持續15秒。巨獸血量低于50%時，傷害額外提高25%。射擊和技能造成火焰傷害。毎局狩獵中只能使用一次，但是擊殺巨獸可以刷新使用次數或90秒後重置。
unique_effects.name: TorgadoroLegendaryAbility

unique_effects.description: Legendary Ability: Teleport to a Behemoth, dealing Shock damage. Usable once, but resets on Behemoth kill.
unique_effects.descriptionT: 傳奇能力：[Legendary Attack]瞬間移動到巨獸身邊並對巨獸造成雷電傷害。射擊和技能造成雷電傷害。毎局狩獵中只能使用一次，但是擊殺巨獸可以刷新使用次數或2分鐘後重置。
unique_effects.name: MalkarionLegendaryAbility

unique_effects.description: Activate to enter Feast, taking damage over time but gaining significant lifesteal, attack speed, and creating aetheric waves with each attack that deal area damage.

unique_effects.description: Load {{magBombs}} Mag Bombs into your magazine. They attach to enemies and are detonated on Reload. The first Mag Bomb attached to each Behemoth part deals +{{damage}} damage.
unique_effects.name: TwinSunsChamber
unique_effects.title: Chamber

unique_effects.description: Dash in a direction, becoming invulnerable for the duration. After dodging through an attack, fire {{miniShots}} mini-shots that always crit. While in Mag Bomb mode, fires {{magBombs}} Mag Bombs instead.
unique_effects.name: TwinSunsGrip
unique_effects.title: Grip

unique_effects.description: After a critical strike, reduce the cooldown of Mag Bomb mode by {{cooldownReduceTime}} seconds.
unique_effects.name: TwinSunsPrism
unique_effects.title: Prism

unique_effects.description:

in that time, and removes debuffs. Become invulnerable and gain increased move speed for {{moveSpeedTime}} seconds. Usable
while downed. Resets on Behemoth kill or after {{killResetTime}} seconds.
